plot: An American firm hires Trixie to spy in Wiesinger's toy factory. By the time Herr Wiesinger finds out, Trixie has already fallen in love with his son Teddy.
title: Trubel um Trixie
plot_es: An American firm hires Trixie to spy in Wiesinger's toy factory. By the time Herr Wiesinger finds out, Trixie has already fallen in love with his son Teddy.
plot_en: An American firm hires Trixie to spy in Wiesinger's toy factory. By the time Herr Wiesinger finds out, Trixie has already fallen in love with his son Teddy.
